felidae.description: The Felidae family, commonly known as cats, is a family of mammals in the order Carnivora.

panthera.description: Panthera is a genus within the family Felidae which was named and first described by Lorenz Oken in 1816. The five extant species are the tiger, the lion, the jaguar, the leopard, and the snow leopard.

ursidae.description: The Ursidae family, commonly known as bears, is a family of mammals in the order Carnivora.
